nodes.bodyText: Thanks for this contribution, I love it! Seeing that this only adds additional warn logs during the build, I fear everyone will just ignore this, and it won't really add any value... (This is why Checkstyle and SpotBugs are "enforced" now; if we don't do that, it's pretty much pointless.) I think what would be much more useful is if this was set to fail on violation, at violation log level error. I suspect that probably will cause some failure, but we should fix those...
Ping @percyashu , will u like o address this so it can be merged by @vorburger ?
I will make the changes and fix the violation.
